com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc

Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.Station

  • public class Station
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Station sign information

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Station(SignActionEvent info) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void centerTrain()
      Orders the train to center above this Station
      MinecartMember<?> getCenterCart()
      Gets the minecart that has to be centred above the sign
      long getDelay()
      Gets the delay between action and launch (in milliseconds)
      org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getInstruction()
      Gets the instruction this station has right now
      - This is SELF when it has to center the train
      - This is the direction to launch to if it has to launch
      - This is null if the station should do nothing and release the train
      double getLength()
      Gets the length of the station
      Direction getNextDirection()
      Gets the direction to launch to after waiting
      boolean hasDelay()
      Gets whether this station has a delay set
      boolean isValid()
      Checks if this Station is valid for use
      void launchTo(org.bukkit.block.BlockFace direction, double distance)
      Launches the train so that the middle or front cart is the distance away from this station
      void waitTrain(long delay)
      Waits a train for a specific amount of time.

        public boolean hasDelay()
        Gets whether this station has a delay set
        Returns:

        Checks if this Station is valid for use
        Returns:
        True if valid, False if not

        public org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getInstruction()
        Gets the instruction this station has right now
        - This is SELF when it has to center the train
        - This is the direction to launch to if it has to launch
        - This is null if the station should do nothing and release the train

      • getNextDirection

        Gets the direction to launch to after waiting
        Returns:

        public MinecartMember<?> getCenterCart()
        Gets the minecart that has to be centred above the sign
        Returns:
        center minecart

      • waitTrain

        public void waitTrain(long delay)
        Waits a train for a specific amount of time. This causes the train to play the station sound, refill the fuel and toggle the station levers on.
        Parameters:
        delay - to wait, use 0 for no delay, MAX_VALUE to wait forever.

      • centerTrain

        public void centerTrain()
        Orders the train to center above this Station

      • launchTo

        public void launchTo(org.bukkit.block.BlockFace direction,
            double distance)
        Launches the train so that the middle or front cart is the distance away from this station
        Parameters:
        direction - to launch into
        distance - to launch
